text: The UniCredit Bank Hungary, or simply UniCredit Bank, is a commercial bank in Hungary. It was established in 1990 as Creditanstalt Plc., the Hungarian subsidiary of the historic Austro-Hungarian Creditanstalt. After the parent company was sold, it first became part of the German HypoVereinsbank and then, following another merger in 2005, it came under the ownership of the Italian UniCredit Group. It adopted its current name in 2007. Category:Banks of Hungary
title: UniCredit Bank Hungary
